1.Text: <speak><prosody rate="x-fast" pitch="high">Come <emphasis level="strong"><prosody amazon:max-duration="0.25s">On, </prosody></emphasis> </prosody> <emphasis><prosody rate="fast" pitch="high"> let’s pick it up! Your typing speed has been 25wpm in the past minute, down from your 45 wpm average! </prosody></emphasis></speak>

2.Text: <speak><prosody rate="105%" pitch="high">Are you <emphasis>going </emphasis>to keep typing? You have been  <emphasis>inactive for two minutes. </emphasis> </prosody></speak>

3.Text: <speak><prosody rate="fast" pitch="high"><emphasis>Great job</emphasis> so <emphasis>far!</emphasis></prosody><prosody rate="110%">However, I </prosody> <prosody rate="120%"><emphasis>know you can</emphasis> </prosody> <prosody rate="110%"> do better. Your typing has slowed to 25 wpm. </prosody></speak>

4.Text: <speak><prosody rate="105%" pitch="high">Your typing speed<emphasis> has slowed </emphasis> to an average of 25 wpm. <break time="0.3s"/>You would feel better if you <emphasis>finished your typing sooner</emphasis> </prosody><prosody rate="95%" pitch="high">  rather than later. </prosody></speak>

1.Text: <speak><prosody rate="110%" pitch="high">No problem</prosody>, <prosody pitch="high">I’ll wait </prosody> for you.</speak>

2.Text: <speak>I <prosody pitch="low">appreciate </prosody> the effort you’re <prosody pitch="low">putting</prosody> into your<prosody pitch="low"> work. </prosody></speak>

3.Text: <speak>This is hard,<break time="0.3s"/> but you’re doing <prosody pitch="high">great!</prosody></speak>

4.Text: <speak><prosody rate="115%">OK</prosody>, <prosody pitch="high"> we can pause </prosody> for a moment. </speak>

5.Text: <speak><prosody pitch="high">You’ve been doing well.</prosody><prosody rate="90%" pitch="high">Keep going! </prosody></speak>

6.Text: <speak>Even though I am a <prosody pitch="high">robot</prosody>, I <prosody pitch="high">also</prosody> get distracted. </speak>

8.Text: <speak><prosody rate="x-fast" pitch="high">Come <emphasis level="strong"><prosody amazon:max-duration="0.25s">On, </prosody></emphasis> </prosody> , you can <prosody pitch="high">do it!</prosody></speak>

9.Text: <speak><prosody pitch="high" rate="95%">It’s good to </prosody> <prosody pitch="high">give ourselves a quick break.</prosody></speak>
